statements.name: PROC PRINT
statements.description: Prints observations in a SAS data set using some or all of the variables.

statements.name: ATTRIB
statements.description: Associates a format, informat, label, and length with one or more variables.

statements.name: BY
statements.description: Orders the output according to the BY groups.

statements.name: ID
statements.description: Identifies observations by using the formatted values of the variables that you list instead of by using observation numbers.

statements.name: PAGEBY
statements.description: Controls page ejects that occur before a page is full.

statements.name: SUMBY
statements.description: Limits the number of sums that appear in the report.

statements.name: VAR
statements.description: Selects variables that appear in the report and determines their order.

statements.name: WHERE
statements.description: Subsets the input data set by specifying certain conditions that each observation must meet before it is available for processing.
